description:
If you had to choose only one sporty canyon with water in Bali, Kerenkali would be perfect. Located in GitGit area, Kerenkali is the extension of Kalimudah canyon.

Approach

Descent

Kerenkali is practicable throughout the year. It has 2 single parts: the first one is a sequence of jumps, water slides, short rappels with gorges made of volcanic rock, caves and tuff, sulphurate water basin coming out from the underground, a mix of fun and exploration for esthetic and thrills pleasure. The second part, sportier, enchanting rappel descents along waterfall (the highest is 20m), swim, jumps up to 10m (optional), floating.

Exit

Red tape

Trip reports and media

Background

Explored by Adventure and spirit team on 15 october 2010 By Mika Denissot - Winaryo and Gede.. Fully bolting and maintenance by https://www.adventureandspirit.com
